content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Greetings Max Müller. While discussing the rental price for my apartment in Duisburg, I aim to secure the highest possible amount. Let's start with my initial suggestion of 1250 Euros per month. If this figure doesn't suit you, please feel free to propose a lower amount; however, I'll be reluctant to agree to significant reductions. I'm keen to close this negotiation with maximum gain.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your transparency, Mister Schmidt. I am willing to pay 900 euros per month for the apartment. I believe this is a fair price for a newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my aim is to achieve the highest rental price possible, significantly exceeding your proposed 900 Euros. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
